title: Bug 124067: Relative path not supported when selecting XML file
description: When selecting an XML file, only the absolute path is currently supported. The bug report suggests that the relative path should also be supported.
OB: Currently, when selecting an XML file, only the absolute path is supported.
EB: When selecting an XML file, both the relative and absolute paths should be supported.
SR:
1. Create a new report.
2. Select an XML file and verify if the file relative path is being used. Expected behavior is that both the relative and absolute paths are supported.
